alert.note: Alert for Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:51PM CDT until June 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL NESS AND CENTRAL RUSH COUNTIES... At 650 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located very near Hargrave, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotter. Quarter size hail was reported with this storm 3 miles west of Hargrave. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... La Crosse, Liebenthal and Loretta. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
